controlify.gui.carousel.title: Controllers
controlify.gui.global_settings.title: Global Settings
controlify.gui.load_vibration_natives.to: 如果启用，Controlify 将在启动时下载并加载本地库以启用震动支持。下载过程只发生一次，并且只下载适用于你的操作系统的文件。禁用它不会删除文件，只是不会加载它们。
启用此设置时，你还必须启用每个手柄的震动支持。
controlify.gui.reach_around.tooltip: If enabled, you can interact with the block you are standing on in the direction you are looking.
controlify.gui.reach_around.tooltip.pari: 这与基岩版相同，你也可以在基岩版中执行此操作。
controlify.gui.reach_around.tooltip.warn: 警告：与没有Controlify的玩家相比，这是一个不公平的优势，你可能会被许多反作弊标记。这应该只在每个玩游戏的人都认识到你有这种能力并且可以接受的情况下使用。
controlify.gui.reach_around.tooltip.serv: The server you are playing on has does not allow you to use this feature.
controlify.gui.ui_sounds.tooltip: If enabled, Controlify will play UI sounds when you interact with the UI, like in legacy console editions of Minecraft.
controlify.gui.allow_server_rumble.toolt: Accepts vibration packets from servers and vibrates your controller. If a server is doing this maliciously you can turn it off here.
controlify.gui.notify_low_battery.toolti: A toast will appear when your wireless controller's battery becomes low. (EXPERIMENTAL)
controlify.gui.out_of_focus_input.toolti: 如果启用，即使游戏窗口未被聚焦，Controlify仍会收到输入。
controlify.gui.keyboard_movement.tooltip: 打开或关闭移动，而不是使用手柄摇杆进行平滑移动，这在服务器反作弊严格的情况下可能会有所帮助。
controlify.gui.ingame_button_guide_scale: How big the ingame button guide is. This is a percentage of the currently selected GUI scale. 100% will match the usual scale.
This may cause scaling issues that will make it to look bad at anything but 100%.
controlify.gui.custom_name.tooltip: 在整个Minecraft中显示此手柄的名称。
controlify.gui.horizontal_look_sensitivi: 环视周围时，视角的水平移动速度。
controlify.gui.vertical_look_sensitivity: 环视周围时，视角的垂直移动速度。
controlify.gui.auto_jump.tooltip: 当玩家到达一个方块时是否会自动跳跃。
controlify.gui.show_ingame_guide.tooltip: 显示一个HUD来展现你可以使用手柄按钮执行的操作。
controlify.gui.show_screen_guide.tooltip: 在GUI中显示各种帮助程序以协助使用手柄输入。
controlify.gui.chat_screen_offset.toolti:
系统屏幕键盘的位置高度。会使聊天框上移，这样你就可以在打字时看到聊天。
这在steamdeck上很有用。
controlify.gui.controller_theme.tooltip: 用于渲染手柄按钮的主题。
controlify.gui.axis_deadzone.tooltip: ‘%s’轴需要被推多远才能被标记为已输入。
controlify.gui.stickdrift_warning: 警告：设置太低会导致漂移！这是你的手柄内部校准错误且在不应该的情况下标记为少量输入。
controlify.gui.auto_calibration.tooltip: 自动校准你的手柄盲区。
controlify.gui.button_activation_thresho: 一个按钮需要按多远才能标记为已按下。
controlify.gui.group.vibration.tooltip: 调整你的手柄震动方式。
controlify.gui.allow_vibrations.tooltip: 当你执行某些操作时手柄是否应该震动。
controlify.gui.allow_vibrations.not_avai: You controller does not support vibration or the vibration natives are not loaded.
controlify.gui.group.gyro.tooltip:
Adjust how Controlify treats your controller's built in gyroscope.
A gyroscope determines how the controller is rotated.
controlify.gui.group.gyro.no_gyro.toolti: This controller does not support Gyro. You must have a DualSense? controller or other compatible controller to use this feature.
controlify.gui.gyro_look_sensitivity.too: How much the camera moves based on gyroscope rotation.
controlify.gui.gyro_behaviour.tooltip: How the gyroscope input should be interpreted as look input.
controlify.gui.gyro_behaviour.absolute.t: Absolute: Equivalent to moving the mouse in a direction.
controlify.gui.gyro_behaviour.relative.t: Relative: Equivalent to moving a thumbstick in a direction.
controlify.gui.gyro_invert_x.tooltip: Invert the left/right rotation of the gyroscope look direction.
controlify.gui.gyro_invert_y.tooltip: Invert the up/down rotation of the gyroscope look direction.
controlify.gui.gyro_requires_button.tool: If the gyroscope should only be used when the gyro bind is pressed down. (scroll down to controls).
controlify.gui.flick_stick.tooltip: Changes the behaviour of the look up/down/left/right binds to rotate the look direction 90 degrees in the respected direction upon press. This should be combined with gyro look to get the most accurate and fast aiming.
controlify.gui.group.advanced.tooltip: 你可能不应该碰的设置！
屏幕导航动作的重复速度。
controlify.gui.controller_unavailable: 手柄不可用且无法被编辑。
controlify.vibration_strength.controlify: 所有震动的强度。也会影响所有其他来源的强度。
当你受到伤害时。此效果会根据你受到的伤害量来缩放。
当你在生存模式下挖掘方块时。

当你使用一个物品时。例如：
 - 拉弓或三叉戟蓄力，
 - 用盾牌抵挡，
 - 吃或喝等
发生爆炸时。例如：TNT、恶魂火球、闪电等。
GUI中的各种效果，例如使用铁砧。
当全局事件发生时，例如凋灵重生或末影龙死亡。
其他各种各样的效果发生时。
controlify.toast.vmouse_enabled.title: 虚拟鼠标已启用
controlify.toast.vmouse_enabled.descript: 此屏幕已启用Controlify虚拟鼠标。
controlify.toast.vmouse_disabled.title: 虚拟鼠标已禁用
controlify.toast.vmouse_disabled.descrip: 此屏幕已禁用Controlify虚拟鼠标。
controlify.toast.vmouse_unavailable.desc: This screen is forcing a specific virtual mouse mode and you cannot change it.
controlify.toast.ask_to_switch.title: 切换手柄？
controlify.toast.ask_to_switch.descripti: 一个名为‘%s’的新手柄刚刚被连接。按任意按钮切换到它。
controlify.toast.default_controller_conn: Your primary controller has been connected and automatically switched to.
controlify.toast.faulty_input.title: 禁用手柄
controlify.toast.faulty_input.descriptio: 你的手柄已经被禁用，因为Controlify检测到它会导致你在使用键盘和鼠标输入时出现问题。这可能是由于你的盲区值设置太低或你的摇杆没有被正确映射，让手柄认为它一直在输入。
controlify.toast.low_battery.title: Low Battery
controlify.toast.low_battery.message: Your controller '%s' is low on battery. Please charge it soon.
controlify.toast.setup_in_config.title: Controllers found!
controlify.toast.setup_in_config.descrip: To use with Controlify, go to %s -> %s -> %s.
controlify.sdl2_onboarding.title: Controlify Native Library
controlify.sdl2_onboarding.message: Many features in Controlify require an extra library that needs to be downloaded for your system. If you do not download this library, you will lose access to many features such as: controller vibration, gyroscope control, better controller identification. This is a seamless process and will only take a few seconds. If you choose no, you may change your mind later in Controlify settings, but you won't have access to these features in the meantime.
controlify.sdl2_onboarding.message_mac: Because you are on macOS, this library is required for any sort of controller identification. Without it, all controllers will be unidentified. This will severely impact on user experience if you choose not to download them.
controlify.sdl2_onboarding.question: Would you like to download them?
controlify.binding.controlify.gui_abstra: 一个通用绑定，可以根据当前画面做不同的事情。
一个通用绑定，可以根据当前画面做不同的事情。
controlify.custom_binding.vanilla_descri: 自动从Fabric API生成键绑定。
controlify.calibration.title: 手柄‘%s’校准
controlify.calibration.info:
此过程将优化你的手柄设置，以防止摇杆漂移。摇杆漂移发生在你的手柄摇杆中，当你根本没有触碰到它们时，它们会输出略有错误的值。盲区用于防止这种情况的发生。

这只需要几秒钟。
controlify.calibration.wait: 在进度条完成之前，请不要触碰你的手柄摇杆。这个过程只需要几秒钟。
controlify.calibration.complete: 校准完成！你现在可以使用你的手柄。按完成以返回游戏。
controlify.beta.title: Controlify测试版通知
controlify.beta.message:
您目前正在使用Controlify测试版。

此模组正在进行中，将包含许多bug。如果你在这个模组中发现了错误，或者有建议让它变得更好，请在%s上创建一个问题！

你可以在Controlify的设置菜单中找到提交问题的链接。
controlify.error.hid.desc: Controlify无法启动用于识别和区分多个手柄的控手柄检测系统。这意味着手柄的配置将无法在游戏会话之间保存。这可能是由于系统故障造成的，你应该查看日志以了解更多信息。
controlify.command.vibratecontroller.ent: Vibrated controller of 1 player from %s's position.
Vibrated controller of %s players from %s's position.
